title: Celiac Tackboard
description: A community board that allows members to share their thoughts, recommendations, and questions regarding gluten-free food, products, and services in Wisconsin.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A simple budget tracking application that allows users to keep track of a budget and transactions. sers can add or subtract funds, whether or not they have an internet connection. Offline updates are added to the web database when the user re-connects with internet.

title: Stack-Tracker
description: An application that allows users to track their Poker Bankroll. Users can track their bankroll by session, and can sort and analyze their play data in a variety of ways.

title: My-Social-Net
description: This is an API for a simple social media application that will allow users to write and share thoughts. Users can add other users as friends, and respond to each other's thoughts with replies. Built using Javascript, Node.js, Express.js, Mongoose, and MongoDB
